programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer in show business, encourages his wife and a talented singer, Uma to take up singing as a career. However, his pride is wounded and their marital bliss is threatened when Uma's popularity surpasses his own.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: A family of five is separated in an unfortunate incident. The three brothers are raised in different religious households. As fate would have it, the family reunites after several years and avenges those responsible for their separation.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Saajan Ki Saheli
programme.desc: Impregnated Kunti (Nutan) dumps her lover to marry a rich barrister. But she's unable to abort the illegitimate child, so she gives birth to and abandons the infant, who grows up to become the beautiful Munmun (Rekha). Munmun finds out the truth about her mother after her graduation and sets out to dig the past.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: A philanderer falls in love with a girl who agrees to accept his marriage proposal if he renounces his reckless lifestyle within six months. While he tries hard to accomplish the goal, a young boy ends up at his doorsteps claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: A fun loving girl falls in love with a guy named Prem Kishen not knowing that it was Prem Kumar who she was supposed to choose as her life partner.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.
